## GraphStructure interface

Adjacency list representation of the graph structure

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface GraphStructure 
```

## Remarks

Uses forward and backward adjacency lists to efficiently store and query connections between nodes: - Forward adjacency list for finding all output connections from a node - Backward adjacency list for finding all input connections to a node
